revision.text:
{{codepointer|Monster AI|Hexen|r=Korax}} '''A_KoraxCommand'''
(no parameters)
==Usage== Plays the sound "KoraxCommand" and shoots a {{Class|KoraxBolt}} upwards and slightly to the right, spawned at 0.0004 units to the right and 120 units up from the feet of the calling actor. Then starts an [[ACS]] script randomly chosen between 250 and 253; or if the calling actor had its {{Property|Health|health}} reduced to half or less of its starting value, between 250 and 254.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Korax}} and derived classes.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
